Text:
For those interested in Borderlands 1, do a torrentz search on "borderlands game year" and you will find a 12 GB version which, I believe, is a Multi-install.

Not sure if it installs in Russian (Have not installed yet...) but I know that the language can be changed in the config files to English, if needed.

I got 12 GBs in about 5 and 1/2 hours.
